critique: The document is a revocation of a previous executive order regarding land withdrawal in California. As the President, the primary emotion I want to elicit is a sense of satisfaction or perhaps relief that an outdated order is being corrected. I will revise the scores to reflect the minimal emotional impact and the procedural nature of the document.
